Content.Text: Hey, wake up! I said, WAKE UP!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Stop sleeping already! A chick has
hatched. Hurry to the coop!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is the newborn chick. Hurry up and
give her a name.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmph. I guess it will do. Make sure you
take good care of her.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Man, I'm so sleepy. Just take care of
the rest, will ya?
